verses.text: Now \w the|strong="H5922"\w* prophets \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* \w and|strong="H3061"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*, \w were|strong="H1768"\w* preaching \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w* \w and|strong="H3061"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2217"\w*, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7598"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3443"\w*, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Jozadak, got up \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w made|strong="H6966"\w* \w a|strong="H0116"\w* start \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*: \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5029"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* them, helping them.

At \w the|strong="H5675"\w* same \w time|strong="H2166"\w*, \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w*, ruler \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* land across \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* their men, \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*, \w Who|strong="H4479"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* go \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* wall?

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* words \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w*: \w What|strong="H4479"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* at work on \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w*?

\w But|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* eye \w of|strong="H0426"\w* their \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, \w and|strong="H3062"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* did \w not|strong="H3809"\w* make \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w give|strong="H8421"\w* up working till \w the|strong="H0116"\w* question \w had|strong="H1868"\w* been put \w before|strong="H5705"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w and|strong="H3062"\w* an answer \w had|strong="H1868"\w* come by letter \w about|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w*.

This \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H7972"\w* \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w letter|strong="H0104"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Tattenai|strong="H8674"\w*, \w the|strong="H5675"\w* ruler \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* land across \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w Shethar-bozenai|strong="H8370"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* friends \w the|strong="H5675"\w* Apharsachites, living across \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*:

They \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* him \w a|strong="H3790"\w* letter saying, \w To|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w peace|strong="H8001"\w*:

\w This|strong="H1791"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w give|strong="H7761"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* word \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* into \w the|strong="H1768"\w* land \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w*, \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w stones|strong="H0069"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w has|strong="H0426"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* \w walls|strong="H3797"\w* supported \w with|strong="H1124"\w* \w wood|strong="H0636"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w going|strong="H5648"\w* on \w with|strong="H1124"\w* industry, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w doing|strong="H5648"\w* it well.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w we|strong="H0116"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* men responsible, \w who|strong="H4479"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* you authority \w for|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* walls?

\w And|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* request \w for|strong="H1768"\w* their \w names|strong="H8036"\w*, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* might send \w you|strong="H1768"\w* word, \w and|strong="H1768"\w* give \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H7217"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* at \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w of|strong="H7217"\w* them.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H3660"\w* made \w answer|strong="H6600"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w us|strong="H5649"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0560"\w*, \w We|strong="H0586"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w we|strong="H0586"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* put up \w in|strong="H0426"\w* times long past \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* designed \w and|strong="H4430"\w* made complete by \w a|strong="H1934"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3861"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* moved \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7265"\w* \w by|strong="H4481"\w* our \w fathers|strong="H0002"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* up into \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w hands|strong="H3028"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* Chaldaean, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* sent destruction on \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* took \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* away into \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1297"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w*, \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w gave|strong="H7761"\w* an order \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*;

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w took|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w Temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* put into \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H5020"\w* \w god|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w these|strong="H1994"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w took|strong="H5312"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H5020"\w* \w god|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w gave|strong="H7761"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* one \w named|strong="H8036"\w* \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8340"\w*, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* ruler;

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* him, \w Go|strong="H0236"\w*, \w take|strong="H5376"\w* \w these|strong="H0412"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w put|strong="H5182"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w put|strong="H5182"\w* \w up|strong="H5376"\w* again \w in|strong="H0426"\w* its \w place|strong="H0870"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* same \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8340"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w put|strong="H8000"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w on|strong="H5705"\w* \w its|strong="H4481"\w* bases: \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H0116"\w* till \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w has|strong="H0426"\w* been going \w on|strong="H5705"\w*, \w but|strong="H1768"\w* it \w is|strong="H1768"\w* still \w not|strong="H3809"\w* complete.

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w*, \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w* seems good \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w made|strong="H1240"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* king's store-house \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* see \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* true \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w an|strong="H7972"\w* order \w was|strong="H4430"\w* given \w by|strong="H7761"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w send|strong="H7972"\w* us word \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H0426"\w* connection \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* business.
